title: Admin Dashboard: Persistent and Discoverable Add Product Actions

requirements.summary: Ensure the Admin Dashboard always provides an Add Product action after creating products, allowing multiple consecutive creations without refresh.
acceptanceCriteria: After successfully creating a product, the Admin Dashboard still shows an "Add Product" action that can be used to open the create-product dialog again.
An admin can create at least 3 different products in a row in a single session without needing to refresh the page.
No user-facing text is introduced in a non-English language (keep UI text in English).

file_operations.description: Refactor the create-product dialog open/close control into a stable handler (e.g., openCreate/closeCreate) and pass it down to child UI so Add Product can be triggered reliably after each successful create. Keep the existing top "Add Product" button always rendered. Use existing shadcn-ui Button for the action. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Harden the create flow so, after a successful creation, the dialog closes and the form state is reset/ready for the next creation when reopened (avoid any stale form values or stuck pending state). Keep all user-facing text in English. Use existing shadcn-ui Dialog and form controls; do not modify UI component source. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add additional, in-context Add Product entry points for long product lists and improve the empty state so Add Product is discoverable without removing the existing top button.
acceptanceCriteria: When the product list is non-empty and the user scrolls down on mobile-sized screens, there remains an obvious way to add a new product without scrolling back to the very top.
When there are zero products, the empty-state area includes a clickable "Add Product" action that opens the create-product dialog.
The create-product dialog opens reliably from every "Add Product" entry point and closes on successful creation, ready to create another product.

file_operations.description: Add a new prop (e.g., onAddProduct) to open the create-product dialog from within the product management area. Implement: (1) an empty-state "Add Product" button, and (2) an in-context add entry point near the list (e.g., a small toolbar button above the table/cards). Use existing shadcn-ui Button and existing layout primitives; keep all text in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new ProductTable onAddProduct prop to the same create dialog opener used by the top action button. Add a mobile-friendly persistent/sticky Add Product action (e.g., a fixed-position button on small screens) while retaining the existing top action button. Use existing shadcn-ui Button (and lucide Plus icon already in use). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
